website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular pogo jumper is sure to impress active children and adults alike.
pros: Weight capacity of up to 250 pounds
Squeaker located in base of jumper for fun sounds during every jump
Able to be used both indoors and outdoors
cons: Some customers wished the handle could be made of higher quality materials

customer_reviews.title: the handle of this toy split in half during a ...
customer_reviews.text: the handle of this toy split in half during a play session with my 2 year old client. the broken handle revealed a cheap plastic tube insert that holds the foam handle. the broken part of the plastic has sharp and pointed edges. i will post
customer_reviews.author: einstein

customer_reviews.title: It really was not my best buy. The kids almost broke his anckle slipping ...
customer_reviews.text: It represents the toy as if the middle bar is a piece of metal not a rubber band. It was a big rubber band making it difficult for children to use. Now it will be put away until theyre much older hopefully the band doesnt crack. It really was not my best buy. The kids almost broke his anckle slipping off because of the instability of the band which looks on the box as if it is a liece metal or something hard so as not to cause instability.
customer_reviews.author: Fegettaboutit

customer_reviews.title: You have to get this toy
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!! Every kid has loved this! Even my 12 year old. Who would think a kid that old would enjoy it but she did. She and my five year old grandson jump all over the house ( oh the squeaking!!!) And laugh and shreek and have so much fun. I though it would be a toy that was played with once and put away but nope, they have enjoyed it over and over. It's a cheap toy for all the fun they get out of it. My 67 year old mom even gave it a go.
customer_reviews.author: R. SineTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing for my 6 and 3.5 year old. They love to bounce and this gets the wiggles out. I love the fact that it's something dad and I can jump on too! Not many kids toys are sturdy enough for adults and this has like a huge weight limit, like 250lbs! Crazy but most things are rated for just the kids. I'd say the only thing no one likes About it is the noise, every time you jump it squeaks like a kids squeaky toy. That is annoying, but something tells me that squeaky thing might be removeable, not sure, but we definitely aren't thrilled with the noise. Other then that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: My grandson took to it immediately and because it is not metal was able to use in the house on the carpet (to cushion him if he
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my preschool grandson who wanted a pogo stick. I was greatly surprised at the standard of this foam jumper. My grandson took to it immediately and because it is not metal was able to use in the house on the carpet (to cushion him if he fell) This has been one of his favorite toys which also gives him exercising. Everyone who comes into the house has to see and try it. He greatly loves this toy and it has withstood many hours and many people up to 250 pounds in weight. I highly recommend this to youngsters learning to pogo stick or adults looking for a fun way to get some exercises in their lives.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy and good exercise indoor or out for kids
customer_reviews.text: This item was for 3 1/2 year old girl. She is petite--cannot yet get pogo stick to lift of ground. She jumps up and down on it (it squeaks and loves that). Her 6 year old brother can easily use as described and likes it a lot. So a winner overall
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lake

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. Took it out of the box, it’s ready to go - he got on and jumped a few rounds. Around the fourth time, he moved and snap - that was it. The top yellow part was ripped and that was it. I thought this would be a great indoor physical activity but nope. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Fun, safe, easy
customer_reviews.text: The kids like it, it's safe and easy to use because they don't actually bounce much and they find the squeaking on each bounce to be amusing. I find the noise a bit irritating after a while, but I can (usually) tune it out. The only down side is that you have to be heavy enough to make it squeak. My petite little 3 year old can't get a sound out of it, try as she may, and she gets a bit frustrated with that. However, it is sturdy enough that even I can jump on it and it's fine. Ahhh, compromise...
customer_reviews.author: ut158

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is sturdy enough for me to demonstrate to a 3yo how to make it work. I had fun with it. Didnt take my grandson long to figure it out. He wanted to leave it at my house so it may take a visit or two before he can bounce all over the house without falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Lauras1316

customer_reviews.title: It is a great toy. fun and easy to use once they ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandfather's third birthday. She was unable to use it. Now 6 months later she jumps 120 times around room without stop or miss. It is a great toy. fun and easy to use once they learn how to use. Most of all the coordination and exercise are great benefits to kids. I would recommend this. We have started teaching her one year old brother. Of course, he is too young but he gets concept of jumping and holding handles.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Kietzman

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the vertical piece is flexible and one has to pull up on the handle to keep it straight (from collapsing). It actually worked well bc my granddaughter is a little too short for it at the current length. That was remedied by tying a knot in it...and when she grows a bit it can be unknotted to its full length. Knot or no, she's having a great time learning to balance as she jumps up and down making the base squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Calikatz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the adults, too!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the squeaky noise or the stretchy bands, but it was rarely put down at the birthday party. The kiddos predictably came up with inventive ways of playing with it: running after each other while holding one end or the other, standing on it doing stretchy curls, and (cringe-inducingly, until intercepted) playing tug of war. We had a ton of adults around, too, and being the giant, silly kids that we are, we were gleefully boing-ing across the yard, too, Momma necklaces and earrings flapping every which-a-way. It was a definite hit! Highly recommend for all age levels.
customer_reviews.author: K T Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun for a decent price !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend’s son who is 6 years old . But not only the little guy but his elder sister who is actually 15 use it and enjoy it so much. They use it in lawn , hard floor and even in dirt road. It endured pretty rough use for 3 months and is in good shape. I am definitely more than pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleShop

customer_reviews.title: ... for a gift but I can speak on my disappointment on receiving it
customer_reviews.text: I can not speak on the longevity of this product because it is for a gift but I can speak on my disappointment on receiving it. This pogo jumper does not come in a plastic bag or have any type of protective cover. But my issue is that it came dirty on the bottom, therefore, leading me to believe that it had been used and later returned. I strongly urge better quality control as it should be a standard practice.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: What a joke.
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand how this product has 1500 positive reviews. This is no more than jumping on a pool noodle with a squeaker inside of it. This is nothing like a pogo stick. The block gives no rebound at all, then my 3-year-old is barely heavy enough to cause it to squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good gift but based on height on kid
customer_reviews.text: This product was a fun affordable gift for my 3 year old nephew. The reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is that the product should inform you the height of a kid needed to use it... my nephew loved it for a few minutes but he was a little too short and had to hold his arms up to his face to have the bunjee cors stretch to work properly. Other than that fun gift for kids and adults
customer_reviews.author: Christine Weithman

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has one and loves it so much I bought more to give away as gifts. It is always a big hit! I recently took one to a preschool-aged holiday party for a gift exchange. It was by far the most coveted toy! All the kids lined up to take turns!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good fun if you can stand the squeakers
customer_reviews.text: Well, the kids just love them but the squeakers in them are SO annoying that we pulled them out. Now, the kids do not like them as much. They say they cannot jump as high without the squeakers. They still play with them inside and out, but they want the squeakers back.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Gift to Great Grandson
customer_reviews.text: He loves the Pogo Jumper and it can be used inside the home. I was sent picture of him on the Pogo Jumper and the picture told me that he was so happy with it. That picture is worth so much to me knowing that I sent him the right present.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnybee

customer_reviews.title: This is fun and not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Really lightweight, portable, not bulky. . My 4yo loved it. Can bounce indoors or out. I can even do it without worrying that I'll break it. Fun to take to the park and let friends try too. This is not the toy that gets played with all the time but when we break it out, the kids totally enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: tigidigi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 and 6 year olds... they have a blast on them! Have reccomended to several friends. I have played on this as well lol They dont look like much and I was skeptical but it has been quite a while and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLynn

customer_reviews.title: Pogo Jumper Delight
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for our granddaughters, twins almost 5 and one 2 1/2 yr old. The original intent was for the latter child since she is quite active, but she isn't quite yet tall enough for the center cord although she can stand on the block and hop. The twins were tentative about them until their 6'1" daddy showed them how to make their jumpers squeak. But apparently they have been practicing, because G'pa had a hard time hearing their daddy over the squeaks in the background just a week and a half after they received them! So I think it's safe to say the Pogo Jumpers were a big hit. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This motivated him to try harder and after a few days he's gotten pretty good. LOVE that it squeaks with each hop
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be my newest "go to" gift for any preschooler! I got one of these for my 3 1/2 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. Out of the box, he wasn't sure how to do it, so my 170 lb husband demonstrated (it's extremely durable!). After a few tries he got the hang of getting 1 or 2 hops out before falling down. This motivated him to try harder and after a few days he's gotten pretty good. LOVE that it squeaks with each hop! Love that even adults can use it and it's very safe. The farthest you'll tumble is an inch off the floor. Just watch where you're hopping!
customer_reviews.author: K & J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome life and durability!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old now 4.5 and all 3 boys have used it regularly for over a year and a half and it works like it was still new out of the box! Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kman1978

customer_reviews.title: Kids will loves this pogo jumper.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and the kids love it. The squeeky noise insert doesn't last too long and that was fine with me since I didn't have to listen to the pogo squeek all day. Hahahahaha
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: He's able to use this easily, and a couple of the younger cousins have ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my six-year-old who's about 40 pounds. He's able to use this easily, and a couple of the younger cousins have a blast on it as well. My husband is a 6'4 260+lb guy and was also able to bounce around, albeit the foam smooshed down a bit more. Definitely an indoor toy, as the foam does not stand up to rough surfaces. If you're sensitive to 'noisy toys' or can't stand repetitive squeaking, do not purchase! You will want to rip off your ears after about ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Meggalicious

customer_reviews.title: All of the kids and even the adults love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the pogo jumper! All of the kids and even the adults love this toy. My husband, who weighs 250 pounds, can jump on this. I'll admit I thought he would break it but he didn't. I have high energy children and bought these in order for them to have a way to release some energy on days we are stuck in the house due to weather. The great thing is the part that they stand on is a rubbery material so it doesnt scratch the floors. I also find that it has been helpful with my youngest child's balance.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these , one each for when grandchildren age 3-5 are here, and gave one to from out of town granddaughter to take home. They're all very active kids who love to learn new skills These are just right for their size and age and give them a real challenge. None of them have mastered the pogojumper yet, but they keep trying!
customer_reviews.author: Bev, Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Good, Safe, Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with this pogo stick, but it definately exceeded my expectations. I was looking for something that my 5 year old could safely jump with, without the fear of falling onto a metal bar and getting seriously hurt. This was absolutely perfect. It seems to be good quality and my kiddo has enjoyed hours of fun with it already. It is the perfect beginner pogo stick.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLove

customer_reviews.title: loved it - as did the adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's 4th birthday. It was a bit too complicated for him to figure out, but that also could have been attributed to him focusing on too many things. His older siblings, 10 and 12, loved it - as did the adults. I'm sure he'll get the hang of it too and enjoy playing with it for years to come. I highly recommend it. Seems to be pretty well made, and so much better than watching videos on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: sbug

customer_reviews.title: Simple fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, keeps them bouncing around and active. Easy to store when not in use. Love these rare toys that have no fancy bells/whistles (or batteries!) and just let the kids play!
customer_reviews.author: Red-Eyed Zhaan

customer_reviews.title: Great for bouncing in the house
customer_reviews.text: I bout this for my 5 year old son. The squeaker did not hold up past 2 months. I imagine it was my 11 years daughters friends but they were under the weight limit so it should have. I'm not that mad about it though because it was a bit anoying. :-) It still bounces just fine and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: It’s just no fun for shorter kids
customer_reviews.text: It was not at all appropriate for my 8 & 9 year old grandsons. They hated them and instantly cast them aside
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product the helps with coordination.
customer_reviews.text: While this foam pogo jumper says it is for all ages, only the little ones truly enjoyed it. It does has a learning curve so if your little ones can't jump now on their own, this will not help them. I do think it helps with coordination by having to pull on the handle while jumping with both feet at the same time. Even as an adult, it took several tries. Overall, it is a cute product that little ones will enjoy using. I would say this would be enjoyed the most by children 5-8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: sherwilson @ Simply Sherryl

customer_reviews.title: Child's height consideration for jumping performance.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son's 3d birthday, since he loves to jump and is very athletic. Giving it a 4 star rating because the height of the elastic, seems to long to be stretch and for him to jump and hold himself. It's not comfortable for him, therefore, not fun. On the other hand, my niece (9 years) decided to try it out and jumped continuously, she loved it and had fun! At the end of the day, she wanted one to take home, so we ended up giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, small price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Christmas presents for my 2 little boys last year. One of them has survived! The other stopped squeaking after the first day and eventually the boys tore it apart. They really did have fun with them and for the price I paid, I was happy. I will say that they are easily torn up but I do have 3 boys so nothing really survives in my house! I wouldn't say that these are outside toys, and if they are to not use them on rough surfaces. They were perfect for my 5 and 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Not what it appears
customer_reviews.text: There's no stick - just two stretchy bands. Which makes it safer, but harder to master. Kids still occasionally use it, but not for very long at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning buyer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter Bunny brought this for my almost five year-old and it was a hit! Even her 2 1/2 year-old little sister figured it out and loves it. The center piece is not stiff- it's like a really thick resistance band, so if they slip off or fall over they don't get hurt. But it still jumps well since they can kind of pull it up with them as they go. The squeak isn't too loud or annoying and it decompresses fairly quickly. The little neighbor girl who's 7 loves it so much her Mom said she wants to get her own. So much fun! And yes, adults can use it- I've tried it myself!
customer_reviews.author: burgi

customer_reviews.title: I was wondering what this was going to be like for such a cheap price and in a small ...
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering what this was going to be like for such a cheap price and in a small box. My kids love it though, especially my 6 year old. It’s a little challenging for my 3 year old but that is to be expected. I tested it myself and was able to use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great price. My kids love this toy. I love that it makes them want to move their bodies. Yay for gross motor skill development!
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the pogo stick was flexible which really made it safer and easier to use. A great surprise my 5 year old loved it if it had been a regular hard pogo stick I don't think she would have been able to use it is easy even I got on and took a turn and at 50 years old I could do it too I don't think I could have done that on a regular hard pogo stick this is a fun safe pogo stick withstands up to 250 pounds! a great way to exercise and keep your kids moving has a fun little squeak that's not to over annoying great buy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A

customer_reviews.title: Not a great as thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as expected. Harder to jump on than anticipated for very coordinated 5 year old grandson. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun, For the Whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a blast. I bought it for my 4 year old son, he has had it for a year and it's still in great shape! I'm a big guy and I have used this toy, I was afraid I would break it but I haven't. Very durable, and loads of fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Jvoles

customer_reviews.title: Fun out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fun right out of the box. 9, 6 , and 4 year old all fought for this even though it was mostly intended for CV the 4 year old. 9 year old got bored first and switched to the stilts intended for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tybee Di

customer_reviews.title: Confusing. The "stick" is a rubberband.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the stick part was a stick. It is like a floppy rubberband. Bought for our daughter to learn to balance but hard to use because she has to pull up and jump at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute and fun product to use. My nephew uses it and is 3 and I can use it and am 30! Great buy, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Laura ny

customer_reviews.title: SO fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old and she LOVES it. There was no learning curve and she loves to hop around the house on this. It squeaks whenever someone jumps, but that actually makes it even cuter. I could see how it would get torn up if used outside a lot, so we keep it as an indoor source of fun/exercise. And because of it's flexible shape, it doesn't take up mush space - a BIG plus for us. This is the best fun-for-the-money I have gotten in a long time - a surprise hit! Everyone in the family had fun trying it out, even Grandpa!
customer_reviews.author: SimpleLittleJoys

customer_reviews.title: Must have for jumpy kids !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for kids to burn steam off. We ended up buying 2 & giving one away for a gift. Both are still being used today !!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome, for kids and parents
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 200 pounds and was amazed at the fact that I can jump all over the house on this thing. It's pretty fun and a lot easier than trying to use some spring loaded pogo stick that I remember from growing up. The best thing is that the piece from the handle to the footrest is flexible allowing you to roll the whole thing up into a tiny place. I was confused when it showed up in such a small box. This also allows users of any height to enjoy it. My 3 year old, six year old, and us parents all like bouncing around on it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: RugerRedhawk

customer_reviews.title: Works but wouldn't buy again, wish I had saved my money
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Not so bouncy and fun like a real pogo stick if your kids can handle a real stick. This is all limp foam. 4-yr old uses for a few minutes at a time, a few times a week. Yes, parents can use but it's not super fun. Would not buy again. It won't hurt the kid because its soft enough but I imagine if he doesn't hold the soft limp "pole" taut enough, he'll trip and face plant. Using indoors on floor and carpet. I imagine street would tear it apart in one season.a
customer_reviews.author: gie

customer_reviews.title: Great value & lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These jumping pogo sticks are a big hit with our 3 granddaughters ages 3, 5, & 8! Our 5 & 8 year olds intuitively knew how to use them right away. I had to take turns hopping with our 3 year old but she got the hang of it quickly. We're all getting lots of exercise while having tons of fun! The unicorn is really cute & worth paying the extra few dollars over the basic design. The basic design is nice too. These are low tech & simple in design & more durable then they look. I'd purchase these again in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: GracieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Jump for fun
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest. Got one for granddaughter birthday and everyone tried it out. Such a hit that we ordered 2 more for Christmas presents for our nephews. Can't wait for the family Christmas this weekend. Every one jump for joy!
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: ... for two of my grand girls and they absolutely loved it! Even 'mom and dad' tried them out ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for two of my grand girls and they absolutely loved it! Even 'mom and dad' tried them out and found them enjoyable. They definitely seemed to find them entertaining and of course immediately trying to out jump the other and seems it will be something they'll enjoy for the life of them... seems sturdy and even with the adults jumping, it held up quite well so made well too! Definitely worth the money for these.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: Really does hold a lot of weight!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy! It is a Christmas gift for my 5-year-old, but I had my boyfriend try it out to verify if it really would hold an adult weight as indicated in description. It does and he weighs about 152 pounds! It also makes the cutest squeaking noise when jumping...though it may become a bit irritating if listening to it for too long! ;) The construction appears to be strong and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to encourage children to get up and move!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was very well received by children at a party. They were lining up for turns and could use it inside. So glad to be able to gift something that promotes physical activity!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Was worried by one star reviews, but so glad I took a leap of faith
customer_reviews.text: These are hysterical. My kids love hopping around the house and is a great way for them to burn off energy. Tried it myself and I must say, I couldn't stop laughing. I was worried because some of the one star reviews indicated that it was just a piece of foam and questioned the point, but my daughter was relentless in her request for one. Since they didn't cost too dearly, I took a chance and ordered one for each child. They are a big hit - much safer/easier to use than a classic pogo stick and generate lots of cute little giggles.
customer_reviews.author: E.Renfrew

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It squeaks when you jump! I bought this one for my 7 yrs old daughter and 4 yrs old son. My daughter seems to enjoy it more than my son though. It's harder for him to balance on the foam bar. One thing I don't like is that they use hard plastic cable tie to connect the blue tubes together and somehow it slips down below the yellow cover. The cable tie can be pretty sharp and can scratch your skin if you are wearing short. Now and then we have adjust the blue tubes so that the cable tie is hidden in the yellow cover.
customer_reviews.author: Loann N.

customer_reviews.title: Item seemed sturdy so I hope he enjoys it in the future
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 4 year old nephew. He was a bit scared to use it, but was able to get it to work a few times. Not sure if he has used it since the day I got it for him, but as an adult I was able to go backwards and forward to show him how to use it. Maybe when he is a little older he will be able to use it without such apprehension. Item seemed sturdy so I hope he enjoys it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrordinary

customer_reviews.title: But it was great. There was nothing to put together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter's birthday. All of the children had to try it out, as well as dad. It was a big hit. I haven't heard how it is holding up. I will post another review later. But it was great. There was nothing to put together. Just take it out of the box and start playing with it. The younger ones needed a little help with learning how to do it. I would recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: Moonsong

customer_reviews.title: My kids thought it was really fun to bounce on
customer_reviews.text: My kids thought it was really fun to bounce on, I even gave it a try myself. However, my 5 year old removed the foam handle padding and now the toy is useless. Without the padding, the handles really hurt when they inevitably snap back when let go. It's basically a set of bungee cords with handles on one end and a squeeky foam pad on the other. I though it was ok but I won't be ordering a replacement. If your child can resist the urge to destroy it, it might be worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AWM

customer_reviews.title: Jump up jump jump jump
customer_reviews.text: We really like this toy. After a day or two of trying it out and being a little wary of what it can and cannot do, it's really fun. The fact that it does squeak is not the issue. It's a safe way to exercise and enjoy some jumping, which is pretty much fun for all. Just be careful of doing this on a flat surface, wood floors are best, the carpet if it is wall to wall or safely secured, NOT on any areas where there is an unsecured area rug. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NYSweetMom

customer_reviews.title: and thank the good Lord for Amazon
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old son saw another child with one of these at the park. Had to have one. Searched high and low, and thank the good Lord for Amazon. Ordered and he has had a ball with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Horne

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Our son got this for his birthday. Well all of the kids wanted to use it! They were fighting over this toy, that is how popular it was. Another great thing about the toy....it takes up very little space. You can easily put this in a drawer or cabinet. Very light weight too. It squeaks every time you jump so you know exactly where you kid is when they are using it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a two year old
customer_reviews.text: Fun pogo jumper for children too small for a real pogo stick. Every one was on it from the 2 yo, thru the 5 and 7 yo, 30+ parents and 50ish grandparent.
customer_reviews.author: rella88

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift to active 6-yr-old in winter for use on indoor carpet in playroom. He was given a small trampoline with base and hand support at the same time, so perhaps that's why this toy is seldom used. It's hard for him to make it work as pictured. Perhaps in a couple years it may hold more interest when he's outgrown trampoline? Would recommend for 8 and up. Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: Parents thought this toy was cool
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this for my 3 year old grandson. Something different to explore. An older girl that is 6 years old could stay on the jumper a little longer than my grandson. I think it is easier since she was taller. Parents thought this toy was cool
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dodds

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for getting your children away from their "screens" and OUTSIDE!  It's such fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES this pogo jumper! She's getting a lot of use out of it! Her mom noticed that the weight limit on this toy is 250 lbs. and she's less than 130 lbs., so she's going to try it. I haven't heard how that went yet, but I'm sure they had a BLAST! This is a great toy for getting your children outside and away from all of their electronics. It's GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Classic and wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this toy! I bought one for one of my daughters, in the unicorn version. Then I came back and bought another for my eldest. They both love them, and even my husband and I use them! We had teenagers come over to our house and love them too! They really are just such a simple and fantastic toy, plus you don't have to worry about the danger of the traditional pogo stick injuring anyone. I'm now back to buy three more for Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this for her about 3 years ago as I can really see kids in that age group of 3-5 really having fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 yr old daughter as I was too scared to get her a "real" pogo stick. So in fact it was a bit childish for her and she kept joking that Santa did not know what a pogo stick was, priceless! Her playtime on in never lasts more than 5 mins at any one time. In retrospect, I should have bought this for her about 3 years ago as I can really see kids in that age group of 3-5 really having fun with it. So nice enough toy but better suited for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Caywoman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son's 4th birthday and it was pretty disappointing. It comes smushed into a little box and the foam part for your feet is almost too slippery. Overall it seems very flimsy and ready to break apart. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leah Kubczak

customer_reviews.title: Not a hit at our house
customer_reviews.text: I don't get it. What's up with all the great reviews? This toy was a complete dud at our house. It's not really bouncy, just a piece of foam. My five year old "hopped" around the kitchen for about 30 seconds and it stopped squeaking. It's been laying around our garage ever since. Neighborhood kids are always playing outside together (ranging in age from 1-9) and not a single child plays with this.
customer_reviews.author: Goggs

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The squeak lasted one day. I have 4 kids sharing this one toy even though I bought it just for 2 yr old. Maybe the weight of my other children broke the squeaky sound
customer_reviews.author: Naairah Smith

customer_reviews.title: So much safer than a pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: A good way to use all the kids energy. They both love this and it's also okay yo use indoors
customer_reviews.author: Jenny patammaboun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I may have got this as a revenge gift lol. Super loud and big enough an adult can use.
customer_reviews.author: L. K.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second jumper we purchased (two kids). ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second jumper we purchased (two kids). The one we received looks different than the one we purchased from our local toy store. It made me think it was a knock off from China. It still functions, but doesn't have the same appearance of quality workmanship. Rough edges, different color scheme than shown on box as well as our other one purchased in the local store. We should have purchased from local store again.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSummers

customer_reviews.title: It is a great outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: This is our birthday gift go-to. It's inexpensive but original! Never given a duplicate gift! It is a great outdoor toy, but perfectly safe for all indoor floors, too. We love to give gifts that are fun toys, but also encourage healthy movement. Moving is good for kids, and good for moms and dads who have tired, healthy, hungry kids at the end of a happy day. A+ toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for inside/outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old daughter and she absolutely loooves it! It seems much safer to have the bungee cord with the handle because if they fall it won't hit them like the old pogo stick would. It stores away very small and easy, she can use it inside or out and adults can use it too. It seems to hold up well especially to be so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann B.

customer_reviews.title: Will not be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, but it broke within 20 minutes of receiving it. My 35lb four year old was using it when the think inside the foam deflated and the handle popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Ari'sMommy

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these, and they are great for burning energy indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Kid thinks it's fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves this. I removed the squeakers, not sure how any squeaker ever can be described as "adorable." LOL! The only bounce created is by the kid, the bottom is just foam, no bounce to it. The handle stem is a rubber band type rope. It's fine on my wood floors and carpet. Can't speak to longevity yet...
customer_reviews.author: Douglas McHart

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I got it for my 3 year old at Christmas and it's been a big hit! It even held up to my 6'4 brother jumping on it and myself!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Parks

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, grandson loved it. Even adults played on it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Energy Burner
customer_reviews.text: Great way for kids to burn energy inside the house. Adults can use the product as well! In case you have pets, there is a squeaking a noise so just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: F. Piccino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hyperactive grand kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect toy for your grand kids on a sugar high!
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult for a 4.5 year only to get to work properly. Returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Eleni

customer_reviews.title: This thing is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his birthday when he was 3. He is now 5 and still bounces around the house with it. It can be used on carpet or hard wood, which is great for our house. My older son loves to do little contests with the younger one to see how can stay on it and bounce for the longest, although it is a little too easy for my 8 year old! This makes a really different, fun birthday gift for the pre-school age.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Anne

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kids probably jump lower than if they were jumping without this thing. It's kind of ugly and weird looking and it's nothing but foam. With that said, the kids love these things and play with them constantly. Kids loving a toy that is nearly indestructable and getting exercise from a cheap product is like seeing a unicorn. This far outperformed the Leapfrog TV console the kids got for Christmas at about 5% of the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: still so fun
customer_reviews.text: this toy consistently gets pulled out & played with by not only my children but nieces & nephews as well. I was surprised at how compact it was! I love that it will not take up much space in our closet. And I was also surprised at how springy it was even more ME to jump on! It was actually pretty fun! lol I really like that it is something active my kids can do inside especially when its rainy or cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crickets

customer_reviews.title: This biggest hit at Christmas with kids and adults alike
customer_reviews.text: Every Christmas I buy for my 7 nieces and nephews. I gave the Kidoozie foam Pogo Jumper to 2 of my four year old nieces - they LOVED them....wish I would've purchased them for all the nieces and nephews (and some of my Aunts and Uncles TOO!). Because the blue part is stretchy, the adults had a blast on them (word to the wise: adults watch out for ceiling fans!). 200lb weight limit. I, personally hopped around for about 5 minutes - GREAT indoor exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Naito

customer_reviews.title: The squeaking is very annoying to me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old. My older two kids have pogo sticks, so I thought my 3 year old could use this. He's not crazy about it. The squeaking is very annoying to me. So I guess I'm glad hes not into it? Three kids later you learn to hate squeaking noises. Can't bounce very high on it. I tried it out myself and wasn't too impressed either.
customer_reviews.author: K. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy for my 3 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for my 3 year old boy. My only issue was that the squeaker broke within a few minutes of using it so it no longer makes the squeaking sound which was disappointing for my son, but otherwise the toy is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun- way better than an indoor trampoline
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old LOVES this. It does make a squeak sound but it's not as annoying as I thought it would be. She bounces and loves it. After a week it is still her favorite. It's a great value for the fun it provides! We have an indoor trampoline but she prefers this and this is so much easier than lugging the trampoline out of the basement when she wants to bounce.
customer_reviews.author: kelly802

customer_reviews.title: too difficult for the littler kids
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great option for grandchildren stuck inside in the winter. But unfortunately, my 3 year old granddaughter cannot get it to work. We think she may be too light, as a heavier three year old had more success. It may be a fun toy when both of them can jump. Right now, one jumping alone is not much fun. However, I was pleased at how easily it stored and my five year old grandson did enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Abe

customer_reviews.title: Terrific For Sensory Processing Disorder-Heavy Work
customer_reviews.text: We have had this pogo for about a year. It took a bit to get the hang of it, but once our daughter realized she has to pull up on the handles while jumping, it was much better. The movements involve pretty much the whole body, so it is great for kids who need extra sensory input (especially on super hot or rainy days)!
customer_reviews.author: Starfall

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. My five-year-old son loves this. He hops all over the house with it. It’s a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Demarco

customer_reviews.title: not for light weights
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old who is at least average if not a little big for his age, between 35 and 40 lbs, and he liked it but he didn't weigh enough to make it squeak on his own. I can do it and its a ton of fun but I have to help him a little. He still really likes it but he isn't big enough yet to do it on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the littles!
customer_reviews.text: Good product to encourage exercise. Id say its best for ages 3 to 5. My son was a little older and his younger play mates tended to like it more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Excercise
customer_reviews.text: These are actually quite amusing to watch the kids bouncing with. I do recommend that these are used outside rather than in the house. Also best for kids over 4 years old for coordination reasons. Younger kids have problems keeping their balance of these. the older girls really enjoy them though and it's also good exercise for them so I encourage them to play with these daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mitza McCordTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fun + Exercise = Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy for young children, fun for older children, and sturdy enough for adults to enjoy it also! I bought one at Christmas for my 2 1/2 year old niece; she loved learning to jump on it and really liked that her parents could do it also. I bought a second one for another niece who just turned 3. Can't wait to see her and her family play with this awesome toy! May just have to purchase 1 more to keep at the house for when children come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Rox Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My boys got these for indoor jumping and regular pogo sticks for outdoor jumping. These are so much easier for them to use than the regular pogo sticks. They squeak when they jump, so that is a little annoying to me. But the kids love them. (They are 3, 5, and 7.) This stick fits kids of all sizes. My 3 year old and 7 year old can use the same jumper. Adults can even jump. A great pogo to begin with or use to jump indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

product_meta.title: Kidoozie Foam Pogo Jumper – Fun and Safe Play – Encourages an Active Lifestyle – Makes Squeaky Sounds, 250 Pound Capacity
product_meta.description:
Able to be used year round, our Foam Pogo Jumper is a fun and exciting toy for teaching children basic yet necessary physical skills like hand-to-eye coordination and dexterity. It also encourages an active and healthy lifestyle through play by strengthening core muscles. It can accommodate children of all sizes and supports up to 250 pounds, meaning it’s just as enjoyable for parents who want hopping fun of their own! With comfortable handles and a soft, cushiony base, your child can safely use our Pogo Jumper indoors and outdoors. It won’t even leave scuff marks on surfaces like hardwood floors! Since its inception in 1967, International Playthings, LLC has excelled in the delivery of innovative and entertaining products with integrity, superior play value, and child developmental qualities to consumers. Over the course of its 40-year existence, we’ve grown to become one of the largest and most respected suppliers of quality products to the North American region.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Jumping fun for everyone! Made from soft, durable foam and great for indoor and outdoor play This lovable foam pogo jumper squeaks with every hop! The bungee stretches to accommodate children of all heights and can support up to 250 pounds. Kids and adults alike will have a hopping good time on the Hop & Squeak Pogo Jumper. (From ages 3 to 100 depending on the functionality of your bones at that age.
feature_bullets: FUN AND BENEFICIAL: Able to be used year round, our Foam Pogo Jumper is a fun and exciting toy for teaching children basic yet necessary physical skills like hand-to-eye coordination and dexterity. It also encourages an active and healthy lifestyle through play by strengthening core muscles.
FOR ALL SIZES: The Kidoozie Foam Pogo Jumper can accommodate children of all sizes and supports up to 250 pounds, meaning it’s just as enjoyable for parents who want hopping fun of their own!
SQUEAKY SOUNDS: Our Foam Pogo Jumper has an adorable squeaker included in the base so your little one can be a symphony of sound as they bounce around the world.
SAFE PLAY: With comfortable handles and a soft, cushiony base, your child can safely use our Pogo Jumper indoors and outdoors. It won’t even leave scuff marks on surfaces like hardwood floors!
SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes (1) Kidoozie Foam Pogo Jumper.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
